phrase: It's never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

phrase: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
author: Isaiah 41:10

phrase: There is hope for your future.
author: Jeremiah 31:17

phrase: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: Alan Alexander Milne

phrase: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walter Disney

phrase: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

phrase: Be positive, patient, and persistent. Never give up.
author: Philip Mantofa

phrase: If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.
author: Michael Jackson

phrase: If I knew the world was ending tomorrow, I would still plant a tree today.
author: Martin Luther King

phrase: Whoever conceals their sins does not prosper, but the one who confesses and renounces them finds mercy.
author: Proverbs 28:13

phrase: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
author: 1 John 1:9

phrase: This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
author: Psalm 118:24

phrase: The Lord will keep you from all harm—he will watch over your life; the Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.
author: Psalm 121:7-8

phrase: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
author: Matthew 7:7

phrase: Life is an opportunity, benefit from it.
author: Mother Teresa of Calcutta

phrase: If you don't lose, you can't enjoy the victories.
author: Rafael Nadal

phrase: No matter how many times you fall, what matters is getting up one more time.
author: Fernando Alonso

phrase: Every sunrise is a blessing, an opportunity to start anew and do your best.
author: Keanu Reeves

phrase: I'm not designed to be second or third, I'm designed to win.
author: Ayrton Senna

phrase: Don't worry about anything; instead, pray about everything. Tell God what you need and thank Him for all He has done.
author: Philippians 4:6

phrase: Our steps are made firm by the Lord, He delights in our ways; though we stumble, we shall not fall, for He holds us by the hand.
author: Psalm 37:22-23

phrase: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

phrase: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

phrase: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

phrase: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

phrase: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

phrase: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

phrase: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

phrase: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

phrase: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

phrase: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

phrase: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

phrase: In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

phrase: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

phrase: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

phrase: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

phrase: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

phrase: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

phrase: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

phrase: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched—they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

phrase: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

phrase: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

phrase: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

phrase: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

phrase: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

phrase: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Gary Player

phrase: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

phrase: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

phrase: The best dreams happen when you’re awake.
author: Cherie Gilderbloom

phrase: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.
author: Jordan Belfort

phrase: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

phrase: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

phrase: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

phrase: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched—they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

phrase: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

phrase: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

phrase: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
author: Edmund Burke

phrase: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

phrase: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Atticus Finch (To Kill a Mockingbird)

phrase: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
author: Galadriel (The Lord of the Rings)

phrase: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
author: Albus Dumbledore (Harry Potter)

phrase: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me: I am a free human being with an independent will.
author: Jane Eyre (Jane Eyre)

phrase: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh (Alice in Wonderland)

phrase: Why do we fall? So we can learn to pick ourselves up.
author: Alfred Pennyworth (The Dark Knight)

phrase: To infinity and beyond!
author: Buzz Lightyear (Toy Story)

phrase: The greatest thing you’ll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
author: Moulin Rouge (Film)

phrase: It’s not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
author: Bruce Wayne (Batman Begins)

phrase: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
author: W.B. Yeats

phrase: You are enough just as you are.
author: Megan Markle

phrase: The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all.
author: The Emperor (Mulan)

phrase: You must never give in to despair. Allow yourself to slip down that road and you surrender to your lowest instincts.
author: Lemony Snicket (A Series of Unfortunate Events)

phrase: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease forever to be able to do it.
author: Peter Pan (Peter Pan)

phrase: The only way out is through.
author: Robert Frost

phrase: You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

phrase: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
author: C.S. Lewis

phrase: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
author: Kobe Bryant

phrase: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

phrase: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
author: Philippians 4:13

phrase: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
author: Jeremiah 29:11

phrase: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
author: Isaiah 40:31

phrase: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
author: Proverbs 3:5-6

phrase: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
author: Joshua 1:9

phrase: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
author: Psalm 23:1

phrase: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
author: 1 Peter 5:7

phrase: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
author: Philippians 4:6

phrase: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
author: Romans 8:28

phrase: The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear? The Lord is the stronghold of my life—of whom shall I be afraid?
author: Psalm 27:1

phrase: Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and he will establish your plans.
author: Proverbs 16:3

phrase: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.
author: Matthew 6:33

phrase: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.
author: 2 Timothy 1:7

phrase: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
author: Exodus 14:14

phrase: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
author: Matthew 11:28

phrase: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
author: Psalm 34:18

phrase: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
author: Isaiah 40:29

phrase: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!
author: 2 Corinthians 5:17

phrase: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
author: Psalm 119:105

phrase: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.
author: Psalm 28:7

phrase: Do not let your hearts be troubled. You believe in God; believe also in me.
author: John 14:1

phrase: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.
author: Galatians 5:22-23

phrase: The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him.
author: Nahum 1:7

phrase: For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid, but gives us power, love and self-discipline.
author: 2 Timothy 1:7

phrase: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge, my shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.
author: Psalm 18:2

phrase: The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.
author: Exodus 15:2

phrase: The Lord is gracious and righteous; our God is full of compassion.
author: Psalm 116:5

phrase: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing. He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters, he refreshes my soul.
author: Psalm 23:1-3

phrase: The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear? The Lord is the stronghold of my life—of whom shall I be afraid?
author: Psalm 27:1

phrase: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.
author: Psalm 28:7

phrase: The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him.
author: Nahum 1:7

phrase: Every step you take, no matter how small, is a victory. Celebrate it, for it brings you closer to your dreams.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: You are not defined by your past mistakes, but by the courage you show in moving forward.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: The sun rises every morning to remind you that no matter how dark the night, a new day always begins.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: Your strength is not in never falling, but in rising every time with a smile and a heart full of hope.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: You are the artist of your life. Paint it with colors of joy, love, and endless possibilities.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: Every challenge you face is a stepping stone to greatness. Embrace it, for it is shaping the best version of you.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: The world is brighter because you are in it. Never forget the light you carry within.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: You are not alone in your struggles. Every storm passes, and you will emerge stronger than ever.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: Your dreams are not just dreams—they are promises to yourself. Keep believing, and they will come true.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: Today is a gift. Open it with gratitude, and you will find endless reasons to smile.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: You are capable of more than you can imagine. Trust yourself, and the world will follow.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: Every 'no' you hear is just a redirection to a bigger 'yes' waiting for you. Keep going.

phrase: Your heart is a compass. Follow it, and it will lead you to the life you were meant to live.
author: AuthorChe

phrase: The best moments of your life are still ahead of you. Keep your heart open and your spirit strong.
author: AuthorChe

author: AuthorChe

phrase: You are capable of more than you can imagine. Trust yourself, and the world will follow.

phrase: Sometimes the right path is not the easiest one.

phrase: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
